summary:
## üöÄ Startup Control + Performance Lab + Essentials Packs

### üß© Startup Backup & Toggle Flow
- Added proactive backups for Run/RunOnce entries + shared backup store
- Restore now falls back by **value name**, avoiding ‚Äúno data‚Äù failures
- Toggles auto-refresh UI (counters, paging, commands)
- Logging now spells out action, source, context, and registry/task path
- Detect vs Apply clearly shown with correct chip states

### üõ°Ô∏è Guardrails & Automation Control
- Added one-click **DisableAutomation** (boot + auto-tune)
- Added ‚Äú**arm tweaks**‚Äù lock + kill switch UI
- All apply/restore actions require the guard lock
- ‚ÄúRun now‚Äù + tweak actions blocked unless armed

###  UI Touch
- Cleaned hero + guard card spacing on Performance Lab

---

##  Essentials Repair Packs (New)
All packs shipped and catalog-wired:
- Performance & Storage
- Audio & Peripheral
- Shell & UI
- Security & Credentials

- Recovery & Boot

- Catalog wiring for all packs completed

##  Performance Lab Engine Updates
- Correct Minimal vs Balanced detection (no more false ‚ÄúMinimal‚Äù)
